result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez in court.  Attorney Scott Alan Wales Aty in court for Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling conference.  Defense advised of pending negotiations and requests plea and sentencing hearing be set.  Case adjourned to Br. 9.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez in court with attorney Scott Alan Wales.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in court for Scheduling Conference.  All discovery received from the State.  Defense requests additional time to review the body camera video recently obtained from the State.  Court grants adjournment.
Matter adjourned to Br. 9.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Stark.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Van Grunsven, Br. 09.

Defendant Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez in court, appear by video with attorney Scott Alan Wales, appear by video.  Adam Best appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription and dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Court orders $6,500.00 bail to be returned.

Defendant Joerges D Cotte-Sanchez in court with attorney Scott Alan Wales.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 052003,

Amount: $20.00
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 06/02/2022@2p
